feed.title: Dittofeed Releases

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • more enhancements auth prep by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/855
  • move fastify definitions from api into backend-lib for sharing by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/856
  • correct settings link by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/858

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.12...v0.13.13
